page.title: 09Entertainment in Chapel.
page.content: There are not many arcades around Chapel and Hogsthorpe. At Chapel St. Leonards there is a little fair ground for children with little rides like cages, aeroplanes, a bouncy castle and water lazers and mini motor bikes. In Miller's arcade there's pop music and a juke box but in Jimmy's arcade there's Bingo for people and horse riding machines. There's a Village Hall and old people dance there for one of the hobbies. In the back of Miller's there's a pool room for people of any age to go and play in. Every year there is a Strawberry Fayre.They have toys and Fancy dress,a ping pong ball game where you win a fish if you get a ball in a jar. In the Village Hall they sell tea and cakes.Every week there is a dance for old people.
